skills.title: Automation

portfolio.title: Tutor Match
portfolio.description: TutorMatch is a platform where college students can connect with peer tutors for paid sessions. TutorMatch makes secure payments and SMS reminders simple and reliable.

portfolio.title: Scottybot
portfolio.description: Auto Checkout Bot for scottycameron.com, a high end golf retailer. Written using python and selenium as a personale project in high school

portfolio.title: LinkedIn Activity Script
portfolio.description: This selenium script scrolls through linkedin and leaves relevant comments on posts using the bert language model and chatgpt api to generate the responses.
